typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	schemaName as string,
	tableName as string,
	businessKey as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: (with src as (\n    select *, rn = row_number() over(partition by $businessKey order by SnapshotDateTime desc)\n    from $schemaName.$tableName\n)\nselect * \nfrom src\nwhere rn = 1),
	format: 'query') ~> source1
source1 alterRow(upsertIf(True())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:($businessKey),
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
